articles.description: All the latest football news from Premier League managers, including Liverpool manager Arne Slot and Arsenal boss Mikel Arteta.
articles.title: Latest Premier League news & build-up - Liverpool's Slot on derby red card

articles.description: A potential squeeze on scholarships could put pressure on England's rugby talent pipelines and make scouts look more widely for talent.
articles.title: Six Nations: The school divide behind England's rugby team

articles.description: Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce says he is considering retirement from the NFL, but is yet to decide on his future.
articles.title: Travis Kelce: Kansas City Chiefs star considering NFL retirement after Super Bowl loss

articles.description: Arne Slot says "emotions" got the better of him as the Liverpool head coach waits to learn his punishment after his red card in Wednesday's Merseyside derby.
articles.title: Arne Slot: Liverpool boss blames emotions after Premier League Merseyside derby red card

articles.description: Hwang Ui-jo, who played for Nottingham Forest, was found guilty of illegally filming sexual encounters.
articles.title: Hwang Ui-jo: S Korea striker get suspended jail term for filming secret sex videos

articles.description: World champion Luke Littler defeats world number one Luke Humphries 6-5 in a last-leg decider to win night two of the Premier League in Glasgow.
articles.title: Premier League Darts results: Luke Littler beats Luke Humphries to win in Glasgow

articles.description: West Ham boss Graham Potter says he "wasn't in a good place" after he was sacked by Chelsea but that it made him a "stronger person".
articles.title: Graham Potter: West Ham boss says Chelsea sacking made him 'stronger person'

articles.description: Egyptian fencer Nada Hafez says it is important to tell women "your body can surprise you" after competing at the Paris Olympics while seven months pregnant.
articles.title: Nada Hafez: The Egyptian fencer's Olympic pregnancy which stunned the world

articles.description: Four-time NFL MVP Aaron Rodgers is to leave the New York Jets.
articles.title: Four-time NFL MVP Rodgers to leave the Jets

articles.description: Emma Raducanu takes a wildcard into the Dubai Tennis Championships main draw, where she will seek to end the worst losing run of her career.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu: Briton accepts Dubai Tennis Championships wildcard in bid to end losing run
